sources.title: Class of '74 (1972) These girls flunked conformity - and started a revolution.
sources.description:
They Taught More Than They Learned!
When free-spirited Maggie ropes shy Gabriella into their hedonistic college escapades, the duo turns campus life upside down—challenging norms with wit, rebellion, and a dash of chaos. But as Gabriella dives deeper into Maggie’s wild world, she must decide: play by society’s rules or rewrite them herself.

Original title: Class of '74 (1972)
Alternative title: Gabriella, Gabriella / The Teacher 

Director: Arthur Marks, Mack Bing
Writers: Arthur Marks, Dick Miller, Johnny Legend, Jack Mattis

Main cast:
Pat Woodell - Heather
Marki Bey - Carla
Sondra Currie - Maggie
Barbara Mills - Gabriella
Phillip Terry - Dave
Lynn Cartwright - Marsha
Christopher Beaumont - Wally

Genres: Drama, Romance, $Exploitation
Release date: June 14, 1972 
Filming location: Los Angeles

metadata.Plot: Four young modern women in college set out to explore all that life has to give with various new relationships and to study the ones they have been exposed to in their past.
metadata.Actors: Pat Woodell, Marki Bey, Sondra Currie
